question: Which state has won the most film-friendly state award at 2018 National Film awards?
explanation: Uttarakhand has won the most film-friendly state award at the 66th National Film awards 2018. This is the first time that this category has been added to the list of National Awards. A panel consists of Rahul Rawail, Utpal Borpujari and A S Kanal announced the award. The Uttarakhand government has provided various subsidies to encourage more filmmakers to shoot films in the state. Bollywood film Kedarnath, directed by Abhishek Kapoor, was shot in the state.
